# ESLinter support for any javascript ES5 project.

[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/eslint-modules-standard-deviation--es5.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/eslint-modules-standard-deviation--es5)

> Add linter settings easily to any javascript `ES5` project using shared eslint config, [eslint-config-standard-deviation](https://github.com/bySabi/eslint-config-standard-deviation), and [ESLint](http://eslint.org/)

## Installation

### npm

```bash
npm install eslint eslint-modules-standard-deviation--es5 --save-dev
```

## Usage
Add `extends` to project `.eslintrc`
```json
{
  "extends": ["eslint-config-standard-deviation"]
}
```

### [optional] enable/disable [eslint rule](http://eslint.org/docs/rules/)
```json
{
  "extends": ["eslint-config-standard-deviation"],
  "rules": {
    "space-before-function-paren": ["2", "always"]
  }
}
```

Add scripts to `package.json`
```json
"scripts": {
  "lint": "eslint . --ext .js,.jsx",
  "testonly": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
  "test": "npm run lint && npm run testonly"
}
```

## Projects using `eslint-modules-standard-deviation--es5`
